alert.note: Alert for Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 4:45PM MST until December 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East central Wyoming and the northern Nebraska Panhandle including Lusk, Torrington, Scottsbluff, Alliance, and Chadron. * WHEN...8 AM until 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
